altername_name: The Labyrinth of the Queen of Shadows
name: Le Labyrinthe de la Reine des Ombres
overview: Le Labyrinthe de la Reine des Ombres (The Labyrinth of the Queen of Shadows) is an educational adventure type game in which you, in the company of the white rabbit, will enter the mysterious kingdom of shadows and live an extraordinary adventure. In order to rescue the inhabitants, prisoners of the evil one, You're gonna have to beat the Queen. Helped by the twins, you will have to thwart her traps and spells and solve the riddles you encounter. Thanks to your vivacity, your cunning, perhaps you will emerge victorious. Good Luck.
